dc_title_s: Map of the counties of Washtenaw and Lenawee, Michigan from special surveys and official records by G. R. Bechler & E. Wenig; Worley & Bracher, engs.; F. Bourquin & Co., prints.
dc_description_s: Shows property ownership. Insets: Ann Arbor--Ypsilanti--Saline--Chelsea--Tecumseh--Clinton--Adrian--Deerfield--Palmyra--Hudson--Addison--Ridgeway--Fairfield--Medina--Canandaigua--Morenci--Riga--Blis sfield and Lyons--Rollin--Manchester--Macon--Hudson (Washtenaw County)--Dexter. Includes county and city business directories, and table of distances; 25 vignettes. 1 map: col.; 143 x 145 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Bechler, Gustavus R.,Wenig, E.,Geil, Samuel.,Worley & Bracher.,F. Bourquin & Co.
